entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
